post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Front-End Web Developer


About the Job
Description:



Thoora is a start-up business under the umbrella of the Rogers New

Ventures department. We’re a small team of less than 30 people

working in downtown Toronto. Our team is a diverse group of

individuals from industry and academic circles who are excited about

creating original and compelling technology.



Thoora helps people discover the news attracting the most attention

within social and traditional media by exploring the entire

blogosphere, Twitter and thousands of traditional media sources.

Thoora was selected as a TechCrunch50 2009 finalist.



Thoora's frontend team is responsible for all customer facing aspects of the Thoora website. This team works closely with the Product Team to design, develop, test and deploy new features.



Responsibilities:

- Write “Frontend” HTML/CSS/JS code

- Write “Backend” PHP in all areas of an MVC architecture

- Working with Program Manager, Designers to develop new website features

- Design reusable, efficient modules and code

- Implementing pixel perfect layouts/templates from compositions

- Maintaining and improving existing code base

- Working with Marketing Team to improve analytics, user tracking and SEO

- Fixing/ identifying bugs and thoroughly testing new code




Qualifications / Skills:

- Solid understanding and experience with a LAMP / WAMP stack

- Experience with n-tiered web architectures

- 2+ years of web development experience

- Experience with databases and SQL

- Understanding of complex / reusable CSS and cross-browser compatibility

- Solid understanding/experience with MVC frameworks

- Experience with Javascript frameworks: JQuery, Prototype, YUI, etc

- Understanding / Experience using REST architecture

- Experience working with Agile development process

- B.Sc in Computer Science or similar

- Personal web projects / experiments are an asset



To apply:

jobs@thoora.com
post.title: Front-End Web Developer
